short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Makes opening of Norwegian newspaper images available in large format
short.no: Gjør det mulig å åpne norske avisbilder i stort format

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Adds an element in your context menu to "Open large image", when right clicking an image on many Norwegian newspaper website.

Covered media groups or publishing platforms:

- Aller Media (Labrador)
- Amedia
- Polaris Media
- Schibsted
- Teknisk Ukeblad Media (Neo)
- Newsflow

This is made open source. See the website.
